meanings.definition: The state or quality of being geeky.
meanings.sent1: Her geekinesses showed in her love for video games.
meanings.sent2: The convention was full of geekinesses, from comic books to cosplay.
meanings.sent3: His geekinesses even extended to collecting rare action figures.
meanings.sent4: The geekinesses of the group shone through in their animated discussions.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with the unmistakable geekinesses of the students.

meanings.definition: The behaviors or interests associated with being a geek.
meanings.sent1: Their geekinesses included coding, sci-fi movies, and board games.
meanings.sent2: Geekinesses like comic book collecting can be a fun hobby.
meanings.sent3: The geekinesses of the group led them to create a robot for the science fair.
meanings.sent4: Her geekinesses were like a colorful tapestry of fandoms and tech gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The geekinesses of the club members made them stand out in the school.
